meanings.definition: Capable of being defeated or overcome.
meanings.sent1: The champion boxer was beatable by the young contender.
meanings.sent2: The video game boss was beatable after several attempts.
meanings.sent3: The unbeatable villain finally met their match and became beatable.
meanings.sent4: The seemingly invincible fortress turned out to be beatable with the right strategy.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle was challenging but definitely beatable with some patience.

meanings.definition: Possible to win against or surpass.
meanings.sent1: The high score was beatable with enough practice.
meanings.sent2: The record time in the race was beatable by the new athlete.
meanings.sent3: The unbeatable record was finally beatable by the determined team.
meanings.sent4: The seemingly insurmountable obstacle became beatable with teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The difficult level in the game was tough but definitely beatable with skill.
